redemption_instructions_by_platform.0:
To redeem your code: 

Step 1: Click on "Settings" on the main game interface  
Step 2: select "Others"  
Step 3: click on "Redeem Code"  
Step 4: enter the redeem code

redemption_instructions_by_platform.0:
**Redeem at microsoft.com/redeem by January 15,2026 11:59 PM PST.** 

Valid for new Xbox Game Pass subscribers only. Valid payment method required. Unless you cancel, you will be charged the then-current regular membership rate when the promotional period ends. Limit: 1 per person/account. 

**Subject to the Microsoft Services Agreement, Game Pass terms and system requirements at: xbox.com/subscriptionterms. **

redemption_instructions_by_platform.0:
Users should log into Bungie.net with their preferred platform and access this page to input the code: https://www.bungie.net/7/en/codes/redeem
Once redeemed on their account, they can obtain it in-game via the Special Deliveries Kiosk in the Tower, or in Collections under the “Flair” section.

redemption_instructions_by_platform.0:
Congratulations on getting an in-game reward for Blue Archive Quest. In order to claim the item in-game follow these steps:  
Step 1: Enter Game > Top-right Icon > [Menu Tab] > [Account] > [Customer Support] > check "Member Code" > Copy  
Go to [https://mcoupon.nexon.com/bluearchive]  
Step 2: Select Server > Input copied Member Code > Enter Coupon Code > Click Confirm

messages.video_end_cta_subtitle: Jump into a new mining expansion for EVE Online

redemption_instructions_by_platform.0:
How to claim your mining ship:

1. Register or log in to your [EVE Online account](https://www.eveonline.com/now/eve-online-catalyst?utm_source=discord&utm_medium=cpm&utm_campaign=cn:ww_lg:en_mg:1_pd:1_cd:video-quest_cs:general_ct:instruction_tg:homepage_br:eve).  
2. Visit the code [activation page](https://secure.eveonline.com/code-activation?utm_source=discord&utm_medium=cpm&utm_campaign=cn:ww_lg:en_mg:1_pd:1_cd:video-quest_cs:general_ct:instruction_tg:homepage_br:eve).  
3. Enter your Quest code.  
4. Log into EVE Online and claim your ship from the redemption queue. You can access the queue by clicking the disc icon at the bottom left of your screen.  
 
If you're creating a new account, complete the signup process first—then return to the code activation page once your account is set up.

messages.video_end_cta_subtitle: Jump into a new mining expansion for EVE Online

cta_config.subtitle: Jump into a new mining expansion for EVE Online

redemption_instructions_by_platform.0:
Redeem the code in-game by navigating to [Store>Items>Add Bonus/Gift Code] at the bottom left corner. 
Voucher code can be used once per account. 
Valid Platforms: STEAM, EPIC, and KAKAO
